title: worldGoard插件如何关闭文字提示

txt_content:

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: 试试 /rg flag [区域名] deny-message [消息]

replies.author: 专业团队
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-4 16:08
试试 /rg flag [区域名] deny-message [消息]
不行....

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content:
打开wg的区域配置flag的位置
添加
deny-message: ''
然后重载配置即可

replies.author: 泽辰zechen呀
replies.txt_content:

配置文件应该可以调吧 试着把他调成空格？
